Description: Micnics™ is an organic based product that is formulated to prevent occurrence of dieback in fruit trees. It is versatile enough to be used for drenching or as a soil application.

SASSORI™ is a complex organic metabolic product which enhances the benefits and effects of applied fertilizers and is an excellent support for plants, which tend to revert to the vegetative growth stage. Use of this product stabilizes and reconditions the internal milieu of the cell.

Willase™ is a reinforced organic product which improves soil texture, increases the water holding capacity and cation-exchange capacity of the soil and decreases the pH of alkaline soils and total sodium content of highly alkaline soils.

SatRite™ is an inorganic soil conditioner consisting of secondary nutrients like Calcium, Magnesium, Sulphur, Selenium and Silica. It works by removing the excess salts from the soil and hence improving the soil quality while correcting the pH of the rhizosphere, and is suitable for moderately alkaline soils.
Chrocal is formulated specifically for soils that are degraded due to high levels of salt especially Sodium.
Epsrite™ is an inorganic soil conditioner meant specifically designed to raise pH of the rhizosphere and hence is suitable for acidic soil rectification.
For perennial long duration crops like fruit trees
For annuals/biennials short duration crops vegetables and for plantation crops
Specific soil formulation specifically for banana
Specific soil formulation specifically for root crops like turmeric and ginger
Soil formulation specifically for most trees like arecanut and coconut
Horticultural fruits trees like grapes, pomegranate
To combat powdery mildew issues in grapes
To combat leaf curl and powdery mildew issues in fruity vegetables
